# Matrix Arithmetic

1.  Write down the size of the following matrices.

    a.  $$
        \begin{pmatrix}
        1 & 0 & 1 \\
        x & y & z
        \end{pmatrix}
        $$

    b.  $$
        \begin{pmatrix}
        -4 & 2 \\
        0 & 1
        \end{pmatrix}
        $$

    c.  $$
        \begin{pmatrix}
        1 & 4 & -1 & 0\\
        -4 & 1 & -3 & 8 \\
        2 & 0 & -8 & 3
        \end{pmatrix}
        $$

        ------------------------------------------------------------------------

2.  Given the following matrices:

$$
  \text{A} = \begin{pmatrix}
                1 & 2 & -1 \\
                0 & 4 & 1 \\
                4 & 6 & -4
            \end{pmatrix},
  $$\
$$ 
\text{B} = \begin{pmatrix}
                0 & 4& 1\\
                2 & -6 & 0 \\
            \end{pmatrix},
  $$\
$$
  \text{C} = \begin{pmatrix}
                -6 & 7 & -3\\
                2& 0 & -1\\
                3 & 4 & -9\\
            \end{pmatrix}.
  $$

Calculate, where defined.

a.  A + C

b.  C - 2B

c.  A + B

    ------------------------------------------------------------------------

<!-- -->

3.  Calculate the following matrix sums.

<!-- -->

a.  $$ 
    \begin{pmatrix}
               1 & 2\\
               3& 4\\
               \end{pmatrix} + 2\begin{pmatrix}
               4 & 8\\
               0& -1\\
               \end{pmatrix}
      $$
b.  $$ 
    \begin{pmatrix}
               0 & -8 & 6 \\
               0 & -3 & 4 \\
               -6 & 0 & 2 \\
               \end{pmatrix} - \begin{pmatrix}
               1 & 2 & 7 \\
               6 & -5 & 4 \\
               1 & 4 & -1 \\
               \end{pmatrix}
      $$
c.  $$ 
    \begin{pmatrix}
               a & -1 & 2 \\
               9 & -1 & 3 \\
               -4 & -2 & 0 \\
               3 & -3 & b \\
               \end{pmatrix} -2 \begin{pmatrix}
               -4 & 6 & 0 \\
               3 & c & -1 \\
               0 & -3 & d \\
               4 & 2 &-6 \\
               \end{pmatrix}
      $$
